ExpSyntax.val: IF ({0,22}='Y', '', 'AND CFLC_ADMNOALLOWED=' & Trim(Str({0,15},'')) & ' and CFLC_CLNTNOALLOWED=' & Trim(Str({0,16},'')))
'Output of invoices has been cancelled after ' & Trim(Str({1,39},'')) & ' records. please refine your search criteria'

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INVO_MARKCODESPEC, COUNT(*) AS N from flprod/invo inner join flprod/cflc on INVO_ADMNO=CFLC_ADMNOALLOWED and INVO_CLNTNO=CFLC_CLNTNOALLOWED where CFLC_ADMNO=:1 and CFLC_CLNTNO=:2 and CFLC_USRID=':3' :4 and invo_aactuali<>0 and INVO_MARKCODESPEC>0 group by INVO_MARKCODESPEC order by INVO_MARKCODESPEC

select INVO_MARKCODETEXT, COUNT(*) AS N from flprod/invo inner join flprod/cflc on INVO_ADMNO=CFLC_ADMNOALLOWED and INVO_CLNTNO=CFLC_CLNTNOALLOWED where CFLC_ADMNO=:1 and CFLC_CLNTNO=:2 and CFLC_USRID=':3' :4 and invo_aactuali<>0 and INVO_MARKCODETEXT>0 group by INVO_MARKCODETEXT order by INVO_MARKCODETEXT

select INVO_NO,INVO_ADMNO,INVO_CLNTNO,INVO_DEBH_NO, INVO_DEBC_NO,DEBC_DEBC,DEBH_HADR_NAME1,INVO_INVOICENO,INVO_INVDATE,INVO_DUEDATE,INVO_CURRENCY,INVO_AINITIALI,INVO_AACTUALI,INVO_AACTUALC,INVO_MARKCODESPEC,INVO_MARKCODETEXT from flprod/invo inner join flprod/debc on INVO_DEBC_NO=DEBC_NO inner join flprod/debh on INVO_DEBH_NO=DEBH_NO inner join flprod/cflc on INVO_ADMNO=CFLC_ADMNOALLOWED and INVO_CLNTNO=CFLC_CLNTNOALLOWED where CFLC_ADMNO=:1 and CFLC_CLNTNO=:2 and CFLC_USRID=':3' :4 :7 :5 :6 :8

ExpSyntax.val: IF ({1,22}='Y', '', 'AND CFLC_ADMNOALLOWED=' & Trim(Str({1,15},'')) & ' and CFLC_CLNTNOALLOWED=' & Trim(Str({1,16},'')))
